ourProcess.title: Our Process - How we build your digital presence
ourProcess.subtitle: A clear, step-by-step approach that turns ideas into reliable digital solutions.

tabsText.text1: We begin by getting to know your business — your goals, audience, competitors, and what makes your brand unique. Together, we define what success means for this project and translate it into clear requirements. The outcome of this phase is a focused digital strategy that guides every design and development decision.
tabsText.text2: Based on the strategy, we design the structure and visual identity of your website or application. This includes wireframes, layout, user flows and other design elements that reflect your brand and align with your business goals.
tabsText.text3: We bring the design to life by building a fast, responsive, and modern solution optimized for all devices. Whether it’s a presentational website or a full web application, we code using reliable technologies and integrate all required features as defined in the project scope.
tabsText.text4: Before launch, we carefully test everything - functionality, performance, accessibility and browser compatibility. We address issues, refine interactions, and optimize the experience so your product is ready for real users.
tabsText.text5: Once everything meets expectations, we deploy the final product and provide post-launch support according to the agreed terms. We can assist with updates, optimizations, analytics, and improvements — ensuring your digital presence keeps growing.

servicesStackedCards.title: Our Process - How We Bring Your Project to Life

card1.title: Discovery
card1.objective: Understand your business, goals, audience and competition to create a solid foundation for your project.

item1.itemText: We start by learning everything about your business - your objectives, target customers, unique value propositions and competitors.

item2.itemText: Clear project brief, success criteria, digital strategy document.

item3.itemText: Questions, strategy workshops, competitor research and analytics review.

item4.itemText: Provide business insights, answer questions, share branding materials or information about past campaigns.

item5.itemText: Typically 1-2 weeks, depending on project complexity.

item6.itemText: Ensures that all the decisions in design and development are aligned with your business goals, saving time and preventing misalignment later.

card2.title: UX/UI Design
card2.objective: Define the structure and visual identity of your website or app to ensure usability and brand alignment.

item1.itemText: Based on the Discovery phase, we create wireframes, user flows and visual mockups that reflect your brand and your audience's needs.

item2.itemText: Wireframes, interactive prototypes, style guide, design assets

item3.itemText: Figma, Adobe XD and design workshops.

item4.itemText: Review and approve wireframes and mockups and provide feedback on visual preferences.

item5.itemText: 2-3 weeks for a standard website; more for complex web applications.

item6.itemText: Helps you visualize your product early, reduces risk of costly changes during development and ensures usability and accessibility.

card3.title: Development
card3.objective: Turn designs into a fully functional, responsive, and high-performance digital product.

item1.itemText: We translate designs into clean, optimized code, integrating required functionality, animations and third-party tools.

item2.itemText: Fully functional website or web app, including CMS setup if applicable, initial content upload.

item3.itemText: HTML, CSS, JavaScript (React, Vue, etc.), Bootstrap, APIs, version control (Git).

item4.itemText: Provide final content and approve major development milestones.

item5.itemText: Usually 3–6 weeks depending on complexity. We provide regular progress updates along the way.

item6.itemText: You get a modern, scalable and performant solution built with best practices.

card4.title: Testing & Optimization
card4.objective: Ensure quality, performance and compatibility across devices and browsers.

item1.itemText: We conduct extensive testing, including functional testing, responsiveness, accessibility, speed optimization and SEO checks.

item2.itemText: Test reports, bug fixes, optimization recommendations.

item3.itemText: Browser testing (Chrome, Safari, Firefox), Lighthouse audits, automated and manual QA tests.

item4.itemText: Participate in User Acceptance Testing (UAT) and provide feedback on final functionality.

item5.itemText: 1–2 weeks; may vary for complex applications.

item6.itemText: Guarantees a smooth, reliable and user-friendly experience for the users of the digital product.

card5.title: Launch & Support
card5.objective: Deploy your product live and provide ongoing support to ensure continued success.

item1.itemText: We deploy the product to your hosting environment, configure analytics and monitor performance in the initial weeks.

item2.itemText: Live website/web app, training for CMS (if applicable), documentation, post-launch support period.

item3.itemText: Hosting setup, monitoring tools, analytics integration, optional maintenance agreements.

item4.itemText: Approve final launch, communicate any post-launch updates needed.

item5.itemText: Launch typically 1–2 days after testing; support period as agreed.

item6.itemText: You can confidently go live knowing everything works, and you have a partner to help with improvements and updates.

section2.title: Google Ads Campaigns
section2.subtitle: Search-Driven Advertising With Measurable Results
section2.description: Google Ads campaigns are most effective when they are built on clear goals, precise targeting and ongoing optimization. We work with you to design a campaign structure tailored to the objectives of your business, continuously refine performance and provide transparent reporting so you always understand how your investment is working for you.

item1.item1Title: Account setup using your own Google profile (you retain full ownership)
item1.item1Text: We begin by helping you set up your Google Ads account (using your own Google profile so you maintain full ownership). Once everything is in place, we give our account the approapriate management access and start shaping a strategy built on clarity, relevance and ongoing optimization.

item2.item2Title: Strategy development based on goals and budget
item2.item2Text: Before launching the campaign, we clarify your objectives (whether it's driving leads, phone calls, sales, or website visits) and align these with an appropriate monthly budget. We then develop a campaign structure tailored to your market, services, and target audience.

item3.item3Text: After launch, we keep a close eye on your campaigns every day. We track performance indicators, check search trends and look for early signals that help us make fast, informed adjustments.

item4.item4Title: Continuous bid, keyword and targeting optimizations
item4.item4Text: Your campaigns evolve constantly. We refine bods, update keywords, adjust match types, improve targeting and test new variations to maintain efficiency and relevance. This ensures your ads adapt to real-time behavior and market conditions.

item5.item5Title: Notifications and assistance with billing thresholds
item5.item5Text: We monitor billing thresholds to make sure your ads never stop running unexpectedly. When payments are approaching or action is required, we notify you immediately and guide you through what needs to be done.

item6.item6Title: Implementation of conversion tracking when needed
item6.item6Text: Some campaigns require additional tracking to measure results accurately. When needed, we set up conversion tracking for form submissions, calls, or other website actions—giving you clear insights into what’s working and what needs improvement.

item7.item7Title: Monthly performance reports for complete transparency
item7.item7Text: Each month, you receive a concise and easy-to-understand performance report. We highlight what changed, how your budget was spent, and how the campaign is progressing toward your goals. You always know exactly where your investment is going.

card1Front.title: Edion Trans
card1Front.description: Presentational website for a regional transportation company

card1Back.title: Edion Trans
card1Back.description: A modern, presentational website featuring interactive route maps, validated contact forms with email delivery, Google Review integration, and a comprehensive FAQ section.

more.title: More about
more.description: Edion Trans is a regional transportation company providing both domestic and international transport services on predefined routes. In addition to passenger transport, the company also offers international parcel delivery services.

list.item1: Limited existing content and digital assets
list.item2: Defining the most relevant features for users and the business
list.item3: Creating a clean, professional design that clearly presents services and routes

solution.title: Solution
solution.description: We followed a structured, step-by-step process to build the website from the ground up. First, we gathered and organized all essential information from Edion Trans, including business details, contact data, service workflows, visual assets and Google Business Profile information. Based on this, we implemented key functionalities such as interactive route maps and validated contact forms with email delivery. Finally, we designed a modern and intuitive interface to present the content clearly and consistently.

results.title: Results
results.description: The result is a fast, responsive, and user-friendly website that significantly improves Edion Trans’ online presence and supports their day-to-day operations:

list.item1: Enables visitors to submit inquiries through validated forms, with collected data delivered directly via email
list.item2: Visually presents transportation routes using interactive maps with location markers
list.item3: Allows customers to leave Google Reviews directly from the website
list.item4: Provides quick access to contact details and essential information through a dedicated contact page and a structured FAQ section

keyPoints.title: Key Points
keyPoints.item1: First impressions matter. A clear and professional website builds trust and credibility, helping potential customers feel confident in choosing Edion Trans.
keyPoints.item2: Functionality-first approach. Every project starts by identifying real business needs before design and content decisions are made, ensuring practical and effective solutions.
keyPoints.item3: Strong technical foundation. The website is built to scale easily, supporting future needs such as Google Ads landing pages, conversion tracking, and additional features.

card2Front.title: Studio Foto Adda
card2Front.description: Presentational website for a local photography studio

card2Back.title: Studio Foto Adda
card2Back.description: A performance-optimized presentational website featuring lazy-loaded image galleries, clear service presentation, and a validated contact form that sends inquiries directly via email.

more.title: More about
more.description: Studio Foto Adda is a local photography studio offering both in-studio photography services and on-location coverage for events, portraits, and special occasions.

list.item1: Lack of structured content for presenting services and portfolio
list.item2: Optimizing image-heavy pages without compromising performance
list.item3: Implementing an effective lazy-loading strategy for large image galleries
list.item4: Choosing a clean and elegant design to highlight visual content

solution.title: Solution
solution.description: We approached the project with performance and visual clarity as top priorities. First, we implemented lazy-loading for images using the Intersection Observer API to ensure fast initial load times. Next, we structured and created the website content to clearly present services and photographic work. Finally, we designed a clean and minimalist interface that allows the imagery to remain the main focus.

results.title: Results
results.description: The result is a modern, fast, and mobile-friendly website that strengthens Studio Foto Adda’s online presence and showcases their work effectively:

list.item1: High-performance image galleries with lazy-loaded photos
list.item2: Clear presentation of services and photographic portfolio
list.item3: Easy access to contact information and inquiry forms
list.item4: Improved user experience across desktop and mobile devices

keyPoints.title: Key Points
keyPoints.item1: Visual storytelling matters. For creative businesses, a website must highlight work while staying fast and responsive.
keyPoints.item2: Performance-first approach. Optimizing image loading significantly improves user experience and perceived quality.
keyPoints.item3: Timeless design. A simple and elegant layout keeps the focus on the content and ensures long-term relevance.

card1Back.longDescription: A secure, database-driven web application featuring a client portal, document upload system, and an admin dashboard for managing users, content, and accounting workflows.

list.item1: Lack of structured digital content to clearly present services and pricing

Finally, we implemented the client-facing interface, ensuring a modern, intuitive, and mobile-friendly user experience.

results.title: Results

list.item1: Eliminated the need for physical document delivery
list.item2: Centralized accounting documents in a secure digital platform
list.item4: Provided administrators with full control over users and content

card3Front.title: Promotional Short Video for CERTICORP
card3Front.shortDescription: A short promotional video for CERTICORP highlighting their services and educating potential clients

card3Back.longDescription: A professional and engaging 19-second promotional video for CERTICORP, designed to educate viewers about their services and enhance brand awareness.

more.title: More about
more.description: CERTICORP is a specialized energy audit and management company that provides energy certificates for individuals, businesses, and institutions. Their services are essential when selling or renovating real estate, securing mortgages, or meeting regulatory requirements.

list.item1: Creating a short video that simultaneously educates the public and promotes CERTICORP’s services
list.item2: Selecting high-quality free stock footage that effectively communicates the intended message
list.item3: Designing concise, engaging captions to complement the voice-over and reinforce the key points

solution.title: Solution
solution.description: We started by developing a concise script to address both educational and promotional goals. Then we carefully selected video footage and crafted captions to clearly convey the message within a short timeframe, while maintaining a professional and approachable tone.

results.title: Results
results.description: The final Reel successfully educates viewers while presenting CERTICORP’s services in a 19-second voice-over video with captions:

list.item1: Clear explanation of when and why clients might need CERTICORP’s services
list.item2: Prominent display of contact information for easy follow-up
list.item3: Inclusion of the company logo to strengthen brand awareness

keyPoints.title: Key Points
keyPoints.item1: Concise storytelling. The Reel quickly communicates different scenarios in which CERTICORP’s services are relevant.
keyPoints.item2: Visually coherent design. Every stock video segment aligns with the message being presented, creating a seamless and engaging experience.
keyPoints.item3: Professional yet approachable style. The video conveys credibility while remaining friendly and accessible, encouraging viewer engagement.
